devdoc.author: Babylon Finance Contract that refunds Rari users for the hack

params._users: Addresses of the user to reimburse

devdoc.title: RariRefund

claimReimbursement().notice: Claims rari refund. Can only be done once per adddress

retrieveRemaining().notice: Recover all proceeds in case of emergency

setUserReimbursement(address[],uint256[].notice: Sets the liquidation amount to split amongst all the whitelisted users.
